Text: Sorry guys I made a mistake, when you install this please type "\.minecraft" after whats already written in the installer file otherwise it makes your %appdata% look really untidy.
i cant change the connected username on mineshafter

Could you give me more information so I could help you?

Anyone who cant find any Mineshafter servers, check the page or add me on msn jake_bilbe@live.co.uk and I will give you an IP to join my personal server.

i did the first 6 steps 
now i need to connect my account with my minecraft account 
but when i press on change nothing happens.
can you plz help me?

When you click the change button the page should expand and show two new text boxes for a username and password. If you don't see these try using another web browser or pressing Ctrl+F5. If you see the two boxes but the Connect button doesn't do anything try another browser.

Hope this helps!
